channel.title: Having problems with my client! Won't run :(
channel.description:
Hey guys, i'm having a hard time getting this client to work, so help would much be appreciated. When I double click 'run.bat', to start up the client, this error came up: [code]Unable to access jarfile client.jar Press any key to continue...[/code] Has anybody got a solution? :confused:
Thanks - Morbid

item.title: Having problems with my client! Won't run :(
item.dc:creator: @Morbid_Sin Morbid Sin
item.description:
@Morbid_Sin wrote:

I’m using the Godz k0 Client, just for a test run.
I’m very new to coding.

Read full topic
